articles.title: Africa: Why Population Immunity Is Not a Realistic Goal in Africa's Bid to Control Covid-19 - AllAfrica - Top Africa News
articles.description: Analysis - In public health, an important goal of vaccination and immunisation is to reach population or herd immunity. This is why the term comes up often in relation to the COVID-19 pandemic. And it helps to be clear about what it means.
